root.name: Human Element
root.description: OverviewA first-person shooter about survival, Human Element's character creator will let players initially choose between three character classes: Action, Intelligence and Stealth. Additionally, players will choose one of the three different character identities at the beginning of the game: Survive Alone, Survive with a Partner or Survive with a Young Child. How players decide to customize their character will change the choices and scenarios that they will encounter throughout the game.
